thread.title: RG....a very much great full customer!
thread.title_full: StorageMart reviewed by RG....a very much great full customer!

author: RG....a very much great full customer!
title: RG....a very much great full customer!
text: I have never rented a storage room and I can say, without reservation, it was the most easiest transaction ever. From the toll free contact representative that help me with all my questions and helping me to reserve a storage room over the phone, to the manager of the Storage Mart where my unit is located at. I wish I could remember the managers name, because she was awesome!. Thank you Storage Mart for being there.
